response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you is even greater, estimated at $1,500,000. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This represents an outstanding value, considering the quality and potential it offers.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer. We believe that together, we can create a mutually beneficial relationship that will stand the test of time.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
